Profiles case¶

Here we find some User case of Profiles :

For index (list view)¶

What happens when we try to access the profiles index and it succeeds ? :

ProfileViewsTest.test_index_view()¶
Test that the index view returns a response with status code 200,

uses the correct template, and contains the username.

For profile (detail view)¶

What happens when we try to drill down on a profile detail and it succeeds ? :

ProfileViewsTest.test_profile_view()¶
Test that the profile view for a valid username

returns a response with status code 200, uses the correct template, and contains the username and favorite city.

What happens when we try to drill down into the details of a profile and it fails because the username is unknown ? :

ProfileViewsTest.test_profile_view_invalid_username()¶
Test that the profile view for an invalid username

returns a response that uses the error template.
